an10.35:1.1: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayo dātabbo”ti?
an10.35:1.2: “Dasahi kho, upāli, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayo dātabbo.
an10.35:1.4: Idhupāli, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an10.35:1.6: pātimokkhaṃ kho panassa vitthārena svāgataṃ hoti suvibhattaṃ suppavattaṃ suvinicchitaṃ suttaso anubyañjanaso;
an10.35:1.7: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā;
an10.35:1.8: paṭibalo hoti anabhiratiṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā;
an10.35:1.9: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ;
an10.35:1.10: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ dhammato vivecetuṃ;
an10.35:1.14: Imehi kho, upāli, dasahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayo dātabbo”ti.
